statements: SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre='Action' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM movies WHERE genre='Comedy' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Drama' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Thriller' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY genre ASC, title ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE movie_id=1;
SELECT genre, movie_name FROM movies WHERE genre='Comedy';
SELECT * FROM genres WHERE genre_name='Horror';
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Drama';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Drama' ORDER BY movie_name DESC;
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies JOIN genres ON movies.genre = genres.genre_name WHERE genres.genre_name = 'Comedy' ORDER BY movie_name ASC;
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Horror' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Adventure' UNION SELECT genre_name AS genre, genre_name AS movie_name FROM genres WHERE genre_name = 'Sci-Fi';
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT movie_id, movie_name FROM movies;
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres;
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Action'
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies ORDER BY movie_name DESC
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE movie_id > 5
SELECT movie_name, genre FROM movies WHERE genre IN ('Action', 'Adventure')
SELECT movies.movie_name, genres.genre_name FROM movies JOIN movie_genre ON movies.movie_id = movie_genre.movie_id JOIN genres ON movie_genre.genre_id = genres.genre_id
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT movie_name, release_year FROM movies;
SELECT director_name FROM directors WHERE director_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 3;
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies JOIN movie_directors ON movies.movie_id = movie_directors.movie_id JOIN directors ON movie_directors.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT movie_name, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT genre_id, COUNT(*) AS total_movies FROM movies GROUP BY genre_id;
SELECT directors.director_name, movies.movie_name FROM directors JOIN movie_directors ON directors.director_id = movie_directors.director_id JOIN movies ON movie_directors.movie_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT movie_name FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT movie_name, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT actor_name FROM actors ORDER BY actor_name ASC;
SELECT movie_name, rating FROM movies JOIN ratings ON movies.movie_id = ratings.movie_id;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT movie_name, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT movie_name, rating FROM movies JOIN ratings ON movies.movie_id = ratings.movie_id;
SELECT movies.movie_name, actors.actor_name FROM movies JOIN movie_actors ON movies.movie_id = movie_actors.movie_id JOIN actors ON movie_actors.actor_id = actors.actor_id;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM genres JOIN movies ON genres.genre_id = movies.genre_id GROUP BY genres.genre_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
